title: Rahu Transit in the 2nd House: Desire for Wealth and Voice
summary: When Rahu transits the 2nd house for a Capricorn Ascendant, focus intensifies on wealth, speech, and self-worth. There is a strong urge to accumulate money, status symbols, and material security, often through unconventional means. Speech becomes influential but can turn manipulative if unchecked. Family values and priorities may shift. This transit rewards strategic thinking and innovation in finances, but lasting stability comes only when ethics, clarity, and disciplined saving guide decisions.

sections.title: Career
points: Risk of shortcuts for quick gains

sections.title: Relationships
points: Family dynamics influenced by money matters
Speech can create or damage bonds

closing: Rahu in the 2nd house magnifies the hunger for wealth and voice, but balance and ethics determine whether gains last or slip away.
